official_title: A Personalized Behavioral Intervention to Improve Physical Activity, Sleep and Cognition in Sedentary Older Adults
inclusion_criteria:
* Intact cognition or mild cognitive impairment
* Poor sleep quality
* Approval from healthcare provider to engage in mild to moderate physical activity
* More than 5 hours of self-reported sedentary time per day
* Understands English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 60 Years
Must have maximum age of 85 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Untreated sleep apnea as diagnosed by polysomnography
